lexUnit.name: tough.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: nvolving considerable difficulty or hardship

sentence.text: He regarded being chief secretary , with its need to cut departmental spending throughout Government , as having been the toughest of the jobs ` in terms of sheer workload " .
Whoever is in charge next season faces a tough rebuilding job after the nightmare of relegation .
